title: Invention du smiley
description: Le premier message utilisant les smiley est posté par Scott Fahlman
body:
Le premier message utilisant les smiley est posté par Scott Fahlman. Le message est :

"19-Sep-82 11:44 Scott E Fahlman :-) From: Scott E Fahlman

I propose that the following character sequence for joke markers: :-)

Read it sideways. Actually, it is probably more economical to mark things that are NOT jokes, given current trends. For this, use : :-( "
